inputs.prompt: A graceful pale-haired girl in an ivory lace outfit and orange-tinted sunglasses rides a majestic white horse. The scene transitions from a calm, intimate close-up (first frame) to a dynamic, sweeping gallop across a sun-drenched desert (end frame). The horse’s mane flows with motion, and the desert landscape shifts from a soft, ethereal close-up to a vast, open expanse. The transition is smooth, maintaining the character’s and horse’s consistent appearance and style, with cinematic lighting and a dreamlike, otherworldly atmosphere.
